channel.title: buddhavacana – cattāri ariyasaccāni
channel.description: Recent content in cattāri ariyasaccāni on buddhavacana

item.title: Docs: cattāri ariyasaccāni
item.description:
dukkham samudayo nirodho magga

# cattāri ariyasaccāni
## idam dukkham
- pain
- incapable of suffering
## ayam dukkha-samudayo
- origin
- arising
## ayam dukkha-nirodha
- cease
- suppress
## ayam dukkha-nirodha-gamini patipada
- leading to
- path, way
